### Technical Details of Approach (400 words)

To create the Virus Belief profiles, we used a clustering algorithm.  Since the data consisted of TRUE/FALSE survey responses, algorithms such as k-means were not appropriate, so we fit the model as a mixture of bernoulli vectors and used expectation-maximization to estimate the parameters.
